review: Very easy to set up. Remote can be a little jumpy at times. You have to be very deliberate or it will skip all the way down or up.

review: Bought it for my husband as a replacement for cable but it has no hunting shows...he doesn't like it.  Otherwise it does what it says it does...
author: Corinne Pelletier

review: Had some difficultySetting up i m not techSavy  at all calledAmazon the tech was very helpful and very patient
author: Charles Rodriguez

review: This is a great product! I love the simple yet functional design of the Fire Stick. It's portability for a business traveler such as myself makes it a great device. Being a Prime Member also is a plus, because I have access to all of the Prime Content. If I could have just one wish for the device, I'd want to be able to run off of USB Power from a USB Equipped Television, like it's competitors can.Bottom line: A Great Device at a Great Value!!!!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Outstanding value and so easy to use.
author: Connor Barrett
